#summary script command
#labels Phase-Implementation

== eAthena Script command==

  * syntax
  * loading Structure
    * npc name with #
    * top level command
      * mapflag
      * spawn permanent monster
      * warp point
      * npc
        * event
      * floating npc
      * shop (zeny/cash)
      * function object
  * gid/rid
  * item / pet script
  * number
  * variable
    * structure
      * prefix
        * nothing (default) permanent char
        * @ temp char
        * $ global permanent (save\mapreg.txt)
        * $@ global temp
        * . npc (npc load/restart)
        * .@ scope var (die when out of scope)
        * # permanent local account (save\accreg.txt)
        * ## permanet global account, unique all if have many char-server (save\account.txt)
      * name
      * postfix
        * nothing - integer
        * $ - string
    * scope
      * global - global all server
      * local - local on server
      * npc
      * character
      * script scope
      * extend
        * permanent
        * temporary
    * constant (db/const.txt)
  * string
  * arrays
  * operator
  * label
